import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import UserContext from '../UserContext'; export default function AppNavBar(){ const { user } = useContext(UserContext); return( The Zuitt Shop
{user.isAdmin === true ? Admin Dashboard : Products }
{user.id !== null ? user.isAdmin === true ? Log Out : Cart Orders Log Out : Log In Register }
) }
